quest.name: Bad lib
quest.task:
Server, that accepting only authorized messages are listening on port 12345. It works like this:
------------------------------- #!/usr/bin/python # checker import sys import socket from hashlib import md5
password = ... port = int(sys.argv[1]) s = socket.socket() s.bind(('127.0.0.1',port)) s.listen(5)
while 1: c, a = s.accept() c.settimeout(30) try: buf = c.recv(4096) digest, msg = buf.split(" ", 1) if (digest == md5(password+msg).hexdigest()): c.send("Message accepted: {}\n".format(msg)) else: c.send("Wrong signature\n") except: pass finally: c.close() -------------------------------
You have intercepted one authorized message: "71061df348d5f5fa08a4ebcec51d7e06 my message". Construct your own authorized message
